text: Maximilian Marterer was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Alessandro Giannessi won the title after defeating Carlos Berlocq 6–7(6–8), 6–4, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Banja Luka Challenger - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 Banja Luka Challenger – Singles
